levels.effect:
ATK +40%, attacks apply this unit's Trait effect to all enemies within range
Skill activation grants 4 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)

ATK +35%, attacks create a layer of sticky liquid within Attack Range that lasts for 5 seconds. Ground enemies passing over the sticky liquid have Movement Speed -10% and DEF -50 (Does not stack). Charged effect: Changes to 20 ammo
Skill activation grants 8 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)

Attack Range expands, ATK +40%. Attacks deal damage twice, apply this unit's Trait effect to all enemies within range and create a layer of sticky liquid within Attack Range that lasts for 5 seconds. Ground enemies passing over the sticky liquid have Movement Speed -20% and DEF -100 (Does not stack).
Skill activation grants 32 ammo (each attack consumes 2 ammo) and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)

elite_levels.description: When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have a 15% chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have a 20% chance instead[note 1] (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have a 20% chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have a 20%[note 2] chance instead (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

potential_upgrades.description: When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have a 17% (+2%) chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have a 20% chance instead[note 1] (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

When deployed, Ch'en's ammo-based skills have a 22% (+2%) chance to not consume the corresponding ammo for each shot; Other Sniper Operators' ammo-based skills have a 20%[note 2] chance instead (only the highest effect of this type will be applied)

elite_levels.description: ASPD +8, when there is a water terrain on the battlefield,[note 3] the effect becomes ASPD +12
